ygData.subject: Re: looking for info in Thicken Mana series
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Nope, its used for item enchantments.  The 3rd Book of Wu speaks of making 1 such item.  I won t post the spoiler here (Basically because I never wrote it
ygData.messageBody:
Christopher King wrote:

> From: Christopher King <CKing@...>
>
> I can't say myself.. My guess would be that it provides basically a mana
> potion that can then be drunk to add mana quickly (each higher level spell
> offering more mana) but I don't know..just a guess.
>
>

Nope, its used for item enchantments. The 3rd Book of Wu speaks of making 1
such item. I won't post the spoiler here (Basically because I never wrote it
down) But it is widely available on the web. Work on your tailoring skill, it
will prove useful for creating this enchanted item.
